court: IN THE HIGH COURT OF PUNJAB AND HARYANA AT CHANDIGARH CASE NO.: CWP No.528 of 1997 DATE OF DECISION: January 11, 2007 SMT. SUSHILA DEVI ...PETITIONER VERSUS STATE OF HARYANA AND OTHERS ...RESPONDENTS CORAM: HON'BLE MR. JUSTICE ASHUTOSH MOHUNTA. PRESENT: MR. R.K. MALIK, ADVOCATE FOR THE PETITIONER. MR. RAJEEV KWATRA, SR.DAG, HARYANA. ASHUTOSH MOHUNTA, J. (ORAL) Learned counsel for the petitioner states that this case has already been decided by the Lok Adalat on 7.9.2001. A copy of the order of the Lok Adalat has been placed on record. As the matter has already been settled by the Lok Adalat, therefore, no further orders are called for. The petition is accordingly disposed of. January 11, 2007

judgment_text:
IN THE HIGH COURT OF PUNJAB AND HARYANA AT CHANDIGARH CASE NO.: CWP No.528 of 1997 DATE OF DECISION: January 11, 2007 SMT. SUSHILA DEVI ...PETITIONER VERSUS STATE OF HARYANA AND OTHERS ...RESPONDENTS CORAM: HON'BLE MR. JUSTICE ASHUTOSH MOHUNTA. PRESENT: MR. R.K. MALIK, ADVOCATE FOR THE PETITIONER. MR. RAJEEV KWATRA, SR.DAG, HARYANA. ASHUTOSH MOHUNTA, J. (ORAL) Learned counsel for the petitioner states that this case has already been decided by the Lok Adalat on 7.9.2001. A copy of the order of the Lok Adalat has been placed on record. As the matter has already been settled by the Lok Adalat, therefore, no further orders are called for. The petition is accordingly disposed of. January 11, 2007

(ASHUTOSH MOHUNTA) Gulati JUDGE
